mask457¶

Make cloud mask for Landsat 4,5, and 7

Parameters¶

  • image ee.Image Landsat image with pixel_qa band

Returns ee.Image Landsat image with clouds and shadows masked

mask8¶

Make cloud mask for Landsat 8

Parameters¶

  • image ee.Image Landsat image with pixel_qa band

Returns ee.Image Landsat image with clouds and shadows masked

getLandsat¶

Get Landsat images for a specific region Possible bands and indices: BLUE, GREEN, RED, NIR, SWIR1, SWIR2, NDVI, NBR, EVI, EVI2,BRIGHTNESS, GREENNESS, WETNESS

Parameters¶

  • options ee.Dict Parameter file containing the keys below

  • start `String <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__ First date to filter images

  • end `String <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__ Last date to filter images

  • targetBands list Bands and indices to return

Returns any ee.ImageCol. Masked image collection with L4, L5, L7, and L8

doIndices¶

Calculate spectral indices for all bands in collection

Parameters¶

  • collection ee.ImageCollection Landsat image collection

Returns ee.ImageCollection Landsat image with spectral indices

calcNDVI¶

Calculate NDVI for an image

Parameters¶

  • image ee.Image Landsat image with NIR and RED bands

Returns ee.Image NDVI image

calcNBR¶

Calculate NBR for an image

Parameters¶

  • image ee.Image Landsat image with NIR and SWIR2 bands

Returns ee.Image NBR image

calcNDFI¶

Calculate NDFI using endmembers from Souza et al., 2005

Parameters¶

  • image ee.Image surface reflectance image

Returns ee.Image NDFI transform

calcEVI¶

Calculate EVI for an image

Parameters¶

  • image ee.Image Landsat image with NIR, RED, and BLUE bands

Returns ee.Image EVI transform

calcEVI2¶

Calculate EVI2 for an image

Parameters¶

  • image ee.Image Landsat image with NIR and RED

Returns ee.Image EVI2 transform

tcTrans¶

Tassel Cap coefficients from Crist 1985

Parameters¶

  • image ee.Image Landsat image with BLUE, GREEN, RED, NIR, SWIR1, and SWIR2

Returns ee.Image 3-band image with Brightness, Greenness, and Wetness

makeLatGrid¶

Create a grid with features corresponding to latitudinal strips

Parameters¶

  • minY `Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__ minimum latititude coordinate

  • maxY `Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__ maximum latititude coordinate

  • minX `Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__ maximum longitude coordinate

  • maxX

  • size `Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__ size of features in units of latitudinal degrees

  • options Dictionary parameter file

Returns ee.FeatureCollection grid of features along latitudinal lines

makeLonGrid¶

Create a grid with features corresponding to longitudinal strips

Parameters¶

  • minY `Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__ minimum latititude coordinate

  • maxY `Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__ maximum latititude coordinate

  • minX `Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__ maximum longitude coordinate

  • maxX

  • size `Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__ size of features in units of latitudinal degrees

  • options Dictionary parameter file

Returns ee.FeatureCollection grid of features along longitudinal lines

makeLonLatGrid¶

Create a grid with features corresponding to longitudinal strips

Parameters¶

  • minY `Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__ minimum latititude coordinate

  • maxY `Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__ maximum latititude coordinate

  • minX `Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__ maximum longitude coordinate

  • maxX

  • size `Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__ size of features in units of latitudinal degrees

Returns ee.FeatureCollection grid of features along longitudinal lines

getAncillary¶

Get ancillary data for trainning and classification.

Returns ee.Image Multi-band image containing ancillary layers

getSentinel¶

Get Sentinel-2 Data From EE Examples Repo

Parameters¶

  • startDate `string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__ beginning date in format ‘YYYY-MM-DD’

  • endDate `string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__ end date in format ‘YYYY-MM-DD’

Returns ee.Image masked median Sentinel-2 image
